DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine postprandial ( anytime meal ) effect different dietary fat endothelial function HIV-infected HIV-uninfected men .
DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Endothelial Dysfunction After High-Fat Meal HIV-infected Men
DOC.detailed_description: This study require two visit . Once determine eligible study criterion , first visit participant randomly place receive one two high-fat meal . The participant receive study meal second visit . At visit , brachial artery ultrasound perform 3 hour meal eaten . The sample size 50 subject . This study conduct Clinical Research Center Tufts Medical Center .
DOC.criteria: HIVpositive white male age > 18 year Under one follow treatment category : Treatment naive never take HIV medication Taking Kaletra Taking Sustiva Taking Atripla Smoker Preexisting diagnosis treatment follow : Lipid disorder Cardiovascular disease High blood pressure Diabetes Acute opportunistic infection malignancy within last 3 month current therapy either Active IV drug use
